Key Match Events: Motlomelo Mkwanazi scored in the 56th minute against Nigeria.
Semi Ajayi equalized for Nigeria 11 minutes later.
Percy Tau and Khuliso Mudau scored first-half goals for South Africa against Benin.
Steve Mounie scored for Benin in the 70th minute against South Africa.
Pre-Game Insights: Lesotho and Benin will face each other at the Moses Mabhida Stadium on November 21, 2023.
This will be the third meeting between Lesotho and Benin, with Benin having one win and one draw in their previous encounters.
Lesotho held Nigeria to a 1-1 draw in their previous match.
Benin suffered a 2-1 defeat against South Africa in their previous match.
Lesotho's Thabiso Brown is a doubt for the game due to injury.
Steve Mounie moved into third place in Benin's all-time scoring chart with his goal against South Africa.
